title: Dr. No
brief_description: In 1962, audiences were introduced to the suave super spy James Bond in the first instalment of the classic franchise, <.i>Dr. No. Bond, James Bond has since shot up the screen 25 times and become a pop-culture icon.

constellations_other.name: Gunslingers, good fellas and flea bags
constellations_other.description: Explore how a 1903 western changed the course of filmmaking and videogames by breaking the fourth wall.

description: Dr. No is a 1962 spy film directed by Terence Young. It is based on the 1958 novel of the same name by Ian Fleming. Starring Sean Connery, Ursula Andress, Joseph Wiseman, and Jack Lord, it is the first film in the James Bond series, and was adapted by Richard Maibaum, Johanna Harwood, and Berkely Mather.
